title: Missing a champion capsule from leveling up
body: I'm still missing a champion capsule from leveling up three levels back. I waited after reading that sometimes it can take some time to appear, but it still has not shown up. After the game ended the window saying that I received it appeared, but at the same time the windows for completing some missions appeared. I'm not sure if that had something to do with it or not.

replies.body:
You've been working hard to level up, and that kind of uncertainty would be distressing to me!  

I looked at each of your levels including level 35 which occurred on 2017-12-09.   You received a capsule for this level which included a shard for Leblanc, Amumu, and 90 BE.  

Level 36 rewarded a capsule containing Ziliean and Galio.  

37 contained Teemo, Evelynn, Singed, and 270 BE.  

Your most recent contained Sion, Jax, Singed, and 270 BE.  Grats on leveling up today.  :D

Everything looks okay!
Oh cool! My bad, I didn't realize that I got it, thanks for checking for me!
You bet!  I'd want to make sure I got all my leveling goodies so I totally get it.  :D
